mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_room (building_id, room_number, capacity, gender) VALUES (#{buildingId}, #{roomNumber}, #{capacity}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, b.building_name FROM sys_room r LEFT JOIN sys_building b ON r.building_id = b.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
SELECT r.*, b.building_name FROM sys_room r LEFT JOIN sys_building b ON r.building_id = b.id ORDER BY r.building_id, r.room_number
SELECT r.*, b.building_name FROM sys_room r LEFT JOIN sys_building b ON r.building_id = b.id WHERE r.building_id = #{buildingId} ORDER BY r.room_number
SELECT r.*, b.building_name FROM sys_room r LEFT JOIN sys_building b ON r.building_id = b.id WHERE r.building_id = #{buildingId} AND r.room_number = #{roomNumber}
